content.description: Several cool lay-back moves make this climb a favorite. The first move off the belay can be intimidating, but it's all there. When going around the corner at 5th bolt, it's difficult to see your feet, don't slip like I did and blow the flash.
content.protection: 8 bolts to 2 bolt anchor, a small nut and Friend can be used at and near the top but is not absolutely necessary. (I never used the cam but placed a medium nut.)
content.location: This is directly above the slab climbs on left side of crag at rap station. Approach via one of the climbs below, we used bolts on an unnamed climb left of Black Sun.

content.description:
P1. Start up a short, 6-8 foot, hand crack that begins 10 feet off the ground, which ends. Jog left where it opens again then gain the ledge. 5.10-.

P2. Proceed to highest point on ramp and enter a chimney, follow it to top. 5.7 (Masters of War diagonals right, watch for bees.)
content.location: Between "Masters of War" and "Holocene" is a short crack left of arete.

pathTokens: North Fork of the St. Vrain River
